# Configuration for OneDrive Linux Client
# This file contains the list of supported configuration fields
# with their default values.
# All values need to be enclosed in quotes
# When changing a config option below, remove the '#' from the start of the line
# For explanations of all config options below see docs/USAGE.md or the man page.
#
# sync_dir = "/onedrive/data"
# skip_file = "~*|.~*|*.tmp"
# monitor_interval = "300"
# skip_dir = ""
# log_dir = "/var/log/onedrive/"
# drive_id = ""
# upload_only = "false"
# check_nomount = "false"
# check_nosync = "false"
# download_only = "false"
# disable_notifications = "false"
# disable_upload_validation = "false"
# enable_logging = "false"
# force_http_2 = "false"
# local_first = "false"
# no_remote_delete = "false"
# skip_symlinks = "false"
# debug_https = "false"
# skip_dotfiles = "false"
# dry_run = "false"
# min_notify_changes = "5"
# monitor_log_frequency = "5"
# monitor_fullscan_frequency = "10"
# sync_root_files = "false"
# classify_as_big_delete = "1000"
# user_agent = ""
# remove_source_files = "false"
# skip_dir_strict_match = "false"
application_id = "d50ca740-c83f-4d1b-b616-12c519384f0c"
# resync = "false"
# bypass_data_preservation = "false"
# azure_ad_endpoint = ""
# azure_tenant_id = "common"
# sync_business_shared_folders = "false"
# sync_dir_permissions = "700"
# sync_file_permissions = "600"
# rate_limit = "131072"

0:
mqtt:
  host: mosquitto
  topic_prefix: frigate
  user: "${SECRET_MQTT_USERNAME}"
  password: "${SECRET_MQTT_PASSWORD}"

database:
  path: /data/frigate.db

# Global objects configuration
objects:
  track:
    - person
    - dog
    - cat
    - bird
  filters:
    bird:
      mask:
        - 0,286,0,0,1280,0,1280,403,1188,378
    person:
      min_area: 2500
      max_area: 100000
      threshold: 0.7

detectors:
  coral:
    type: edgetpu
    device: usb

# Global ffmpeg configuration
ffmpeg:
  hwaccel_args:
    - -hwaccel
    - vaapi
    - -hwaccel_device
    - /dev/dri/renderD128
    - -hwaccel_output_format
    - yuv420p
  output_args:
    record: -f segment -segment_time 10 -segment_format mp4 -reset_timestamps 1 -strftime 1 -c:v copy -c:a aac

rtmp:
  enabled: true

snapshots:
  enabled: true
  timestamp: false
  bounding_box: true
  retain:
    default: 10

record:
  enabled: true
  retain:
    days: 2
    mode: motion
  events:
    retain:
      default: 7
      mode: active_objects


# Cameras
cameras:
  # --
  frigate_backyard:
    ffmpeg:
      inputs:
      - path: "rtsp://${SECRET_FRIGATE_CAMERA_AUTH}@10.20.30.151/Streaming/Channels/101/"
        roles:
          - rtmp
          - record
          # - detect
  # --
1:
mqtt:
  host: emqx
  topic_prefix: frigate
  user: ${SECRET_FRIGATE_MQTT_USER}
  password: ${SECRET_FRIGATE_MQTT_PASSWORD}
database:
  path: /data/frigate.db
detectors:
  coral:
    type: edgetpu
    device: pci
objects:
  track:
  - person
  - dog
  filters:
    person:
      min_area: 2500
      max_area: 100000
      threshold: 0.7
    dog:
      min_area: 1000
      max_area: 10000
      threshold: 0.7
ffmpeg:
  hwaccel_args:
  - -hwaccel
  - vaapi
  - -hwaccel_device
  - /dev/dri/renderD128
  - -hwaccel_output_format
  - yuv420p
  # Enable audio on recordings...
  # might cause issues on recording playback
  output_args:
    record: -f segment -segment_time 10 -segment_format mp4 -reset_timestamps 1 -strftime 1 -c:v copy -c:a aac
cameras:
  # --
  doorbell:
    ffmpeg:
      inputs:
      # Sub Stream
      # - path: rtsp://admin:${SECRET_DOORBELL_VIEWER_PASSWORD}@${SECRET_DOORBELL_IP_ADDRESS}:554/Streaming/Channels/102
      #   roles:
      #   - detect
      # Main Stream
      - path: rtsp://admin:${SECRET_DOORBELL_VIEWER_PASSWORD}@${SECRET_DOORBELL_IP_ADDRESS}:554/Streaming/Channels/101
        roles:
        - rtmp
        - detect
        - record
    detect:
      width: 720
      height: 576
      fps: 15
    record:
      enabled: True
      retain:
        days: 0
        mode: active_objects
      events:
        retain:
          default: 14
        objects:
          - person
          - dog
          - cat
    snapshots:
      enabled: True
      timestamp: False
      retain:
        default: 14
    rtmp:
      enabled: True
    
  front_door:
    # rtmp:
    #   enabled: false
    ffmpeg:
      inputs:
      # Main Stream
      - path: rtsp://frig:${SECRET_FRONT_DOOR_VIEWER_PASSWORD}@${SECRET_FRONT_DOOR_IP_ADDRESS}:554/Streaming/Channels/101
        roles:
        # - rtmp
        # - detect
        - record
      - path: rtsp://frig:${SECRET_FRONT_DOOR_VIEWER_PASSWORD}@${SECRET_FRONT_DOOR_IP_ADDRESS}:554/Streaming/Channels/102
        roles:
        - rtmp
        - detect
        # - record
        # - clips
    detect:
      width: 640
      height: 480
      fps: 15
    record:
      enabled: True
      retain:
        days: 0
        mode: active_objects
      events:
        retain:
          default: 14
        objects:
          - person
          - dog
          - cat
          - car
    snapshots:
      enabled: True
      timestamp: False
      retain:
        default: 14
    # rtmp:
    #   enabled: True

  garage:
    rtmp:
      enabled: false
    ffmpeg:
      inputs:
      # Main Stream
      - path: rtsp://frig:${SECRET_GARAGE_VIEWER_PASSWORD}@${SECRET_GARAGE_IP_ADDRESS}:554/Streaming/Channels/101
        roles:
        # - rtmp
        # - detect
        - record
      - path: rtsp://frig:${SECRET_GARAGE_VIEWER_PASSWORD}@${SECRET_GARAGE_IP_ADDRESS}:554/Streaming/Channels/102
        roles:
        - rtmp
        - detect
        # - record
        # - clips
    detect:
      width: 640
      height: 480
      fps: 30
    record:
      enabled: True
      retain:
        days: 0
        mode: active_objects
      events:
        retain:
          default: 14
        objects:
          - person
          - dog
          - cat
          - car
    snapshots:
      enabled: True
      timestamp: False
      retain:
        default: 14
    # rtmp:
    #   enabled: True

0:
# remap app name from label
.custom_app_name = .pod_labels."app.kubernetes.io/name" || .pod_labels.app || .pod_labels."k8s-app" || "unknown"
# remap pod name from event
.custom_pod_name = .pod_name || "unknown"
# drop remapped fields
del(.pod_labels)
1:
# remap app name from label
.custom_app_name = .pod_labels."app.kubernetes.io/name" || .pod_labels.app || .pod_labels."k8s-app" || "unknown"
# remap pod name from event
.custom_pod_name = .pod_name || "unknown"
# drop remapped fields
del(.pod_labels)

0: host=crtsh-postgres port=5432 dbname=certwatch user=certwatch password=certwatch sslmode=disable
1: host=crtsh-postgres port=5432 dbname=certwatch user=certwatch password=certwatch sslmode=disable

0:
# Default DB connection settings
# conninfo to be supplied via the "-conninfo" command-line parameter.
connopen = 2
connidle = 2
connlife = "10m"

# Default workload settings
interval = "30s"
batch = 20
concurrent = 2

# Other default settings
httptimeout = "30s"
